function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Home quarantine creating social and psychological challenges due to long stays at home and isolation","Impact":"Impacts mental and social well-being, may lead to increased stress and psychological issues","Mitigation":"Designing homes to facilitate all daily activities, promoting social connectivity, and providing mental health support","Technologies":"Smart home technology, remote work infrastructure, and mental health support apps","People":"Individuals and families in quarantine","Owner":"Architects, planners, decision makers"},{"Description":"Lack of effective treatment for newly emerging infectious diseases such as COVID-19","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to the spread of infectious diseases, potential for higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of antiviral drugs, vaccines, and immunity studies, and emphasis on physical spaces as a means to counter epidemics","Technologies":"Biotechnology, medical research and development, vaccine production facilities","People":"General population at risk of infectious diseases","Owner":"Public health authorities, medical researchers, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"History of epidemics driving housing reforms and urban regeneration","Impact":"Historical evidence of architecture development in response to epidemics highlights the importance of proactive design for disease prevention","Mitigation":"Learning from historical patterns to inform future architectural and urban planning decisions, prioritizing disease prevention in design","Technologies":"Architectural design software, urban planning models, historical research databases","People":"Architects, urban planners, decision makers","Owner":"Historical research institutions, urban planning agencies, architectural firms"}]}
